Resume

28 Dec 2013

Hello! I am a PhD student in Computer Science at Princeton University. I am advised by Prof. Michael Freedman in the SNS Research Group. My research interests are in storage systems, analytics and distributed systems. Before joining Princeton, I completed a masterâ€™s at University of Illinois Urbana-Champaign under the guidance of Prof. Indranil Gupta. Before that, I worked in the industry building high-impact mobile computing systems.
